name: Mosbeau Body Fit
description:
Benefits:
Contains Salasia and Chitosan that helps dissolve fat.
With Kiwi Extract, Magnesium Oxide and Astibe thunbergii Extract Powder for good digestion and removes fat while cleansing the colon.

Removes bulges or unwanted fats.
Improves stamina and vitality to avoid fatigue.

How To Use:
Take 3 capsules a day. Intake maybe on or before meal.

name: Mosbeau Placenta White Advanced Supplement
description:
The breakthrough whitening, anti-aging and skin cell renewal supplement that boost with innovative and latest ingredient Horse and Marine Placental Protein that is very famous in Japan. Be at your most beautiful in just 14 days! 

Content: 650 mg | 120 tablets 

BENEFITS:
Double up whitening, anti-aging and moisturizing effects.
Get effective whitening, anti-aging and skin renewing benefits from Horse Placental Protein and Japan Patented No. 3899116, 3946238 & 3946239 Marine Placental Protein.
Promotes good blood circulation that gives better sleep through Carrot Extract.
Potent anti-allergic effect with Rose Petal Extract.
Rid skin imperfections with Silk Powder that has 18 kinds of amino acids that revitalizes the skin.
Achieve firmer, softer and younger skin with Elastin and Collagen.
No need to take in other vitamins or supplements for skin-whitening or anti-aging to take effect.
Promotes healthy and renewed cells that make a whiter skin.

INGREDIENTS:
17 ADVANCED INGREDIENTS

Placenta is a rich source of natural and potent amino acid that is essential for the production of beautiful and healthy skin. Mosbeau uses Horse Placental Protein, harness from Japanese healthy horses. It is known that horse placenta contains 300 more amino acids compared to other animal placenta extracts. Mosbeau’s Horse Placental Protein is clinically proven more effective skin-whitening and skin nourishing ingredient with exemplary cell renewing and anti-aging properties.

While Marine Placental Protein is from fresh Japanese Salmon egg that is licensed and certified as natural, effective ingredient in skin-whitening, anti-aging and skin renewal.

PLACENTAL PROTEIN MAIN BENEFITS:

SKIN-WHITENING

Actively hampers tyrosinase activity, a component of melanin that is responsible for skin’s complexion.
ANTI-AGING

Fights & reverses the skin-aging process. It visibly reduces wrinkles and fine lines.
SKIN CELL RENEWAL

Stimulates skin cell renewal to revitalize the skin. This helps to improve cellular functions and protects the skin from degeneration.
OTHER INGREDIENTS

COLLAGEN
Reverses skin aging and visibly removes wrinkles, fine lines and other unsightly signs of skin aging.

SOY ISOFLAVONE
Helps in promoting hormonal balance.

VITAMIN C
Aids in skin-whitening, anti-aging and protecting the skin from free radicals that causes skin damage.

ACEROLA
Is a potent antioxidant and rich with vitamin C.

ROSE PETAL EXTRACT
Has anti-allergic effects and anti-atopic properties.

ELASTIN
Is a protein found in the skin and tissue of the body. It helps keep skin flexible but firm, and smooth.

HYDRAULIC ACID
A natural substance that can be found in the body. It is great for skin care as it has the ability of retaining water. It is this unique characteristic that makes skin hydrated, moist and soft thereby maintaining a youthful appearance.

SILK POWDER
A component that helps revitalized the skin and rid skin imperfections like wrinkles, acnes etc.

GLYCINE
Provide moisture retention capabilities and improves skin’s firmness.

ADLAY
Promotes good skin conditioning and moisturizing.

L-CYSTEINE
Is an amino acid that is very beneficial to the hair and skin.

HESPERETIN
Is an enhancer that boost the effects of Glutathione.

ß CRYTOXANTHIN
Protects the cells from the damaging effects of free radicals.

CARROT EXTRACT
Promotes good blood circulation and active oxygen that helps make the skin look younger and fresh.

GLUTATHIONE
Master anti-oxidant that helps fight free radicals that causes skin damages. It also contributes to good liver function.

DIRECTIONS:
Take 4 tablets a day.

name: PLACENTA WHITE ALL-IN-ONE FACIAL CREAM
description:
NO NEED FOR OTHER BEAUTY PRODUCTS

Moisturize and more with the All-in-One Facial Cream with its combined effects of facial lotion, beauty essence, moisturizer and sun block. You’ll never run out of reason to be at your most beautiful. 

Content: 55 g

BENEFITS:
Get the benefits of skin-whitening, anti-aging, moisturizing and UV protection.
Let your skin be nourished and rejuvenated with Dipotassium Glycyrrhizate and Ubiquinone that serves as potent antioxidant properties. Look younger with great moisturizing ingredients like Hydrolyzed Collagen and Hydrolyzed Elastin. With Butyl Methoxydibenzoylmethane and Sericin for UV protection.
Be young, radiant and fair with Horse Placental Protein an effective skin-whitening, anti-aging and skin-nourishing ingredient.
Improve your skin problems by controlling your skin allergies with Glycyrrhizinate 2K.
Its gel type based texture is developed to achieve a lighter and smoother consistency that is easily absorbed by the skin. It is non-sticky or moist unlike before, and effective for all skin types.
The make up blends easily and smoothly to your skin, so you’ll get a matte finish for a shine-free instant make up base.

INGREDIENTS:
HORSE & MARINE PLACENTAL PROTEIN
Placental Protein is a popular skin-whitening agent in Japan. Recognized as an exemplary ingredient that visibly whitens skin, removes wrinkles and fine lines, detoxifies the body and speeds up skin cell renewal. Horse Placental Protein is a more effective skin-whitening and skin-nourishing ingredient than Pig Placental protein. While, Marine Placental Protein is patented by Japan government as an effective ingredient in skin-whitening, anti-aging and skin renewal.

CO-Q10
A component that cells use to produce energy your body needs for cell growth and maintenance.

HYDRAULIZED COLLAGEN
It forms a film on the surface of the skin making it smoother and softer.

SERICIN
Creates a protective film on the skin to block pollution and harmful UV rays.

DIRECTIONS:
After washing face, lightly pat dry face leaving the skin still a bit damp. Get an ample amount of cream and massage all over your face and neck using an upward, circular motion.

name: PLACENTA WHITE UNDERARM & INNER THIGH CREAM
description:
White Underarms in just 14 Days!

Get the best selling underarm cream that is proven to lighten up dark areas in just 14 days. Let your skin sparkle with beauty with the Mosbeau Placenta White Underarm & Inner Thigh Cream. Formulated to fight the dryness while still making your skin lighter. Standout fairness, achieved! 

Content: 50 g 

BENEFITS:
Infused with Bellis Perennis (Daisy) Flower Extract that provides even pigmentation against age spots, pigmentation disorders and freckles, as well as general skin-lightening activity.
Get evenly fairer skin with Horse Placental Protein for whitening.
With more potent ingredients and enhanced formulation like Alpha-Arbutin, Fulvic Acid and many more.
Confidence all over because it effectively whitens underarms, inner thighs, knees, elbows, areolas and other dark spots.
Provides long-lasting evenly fairer skin.

INGREDIENTS:
PLACENTAL PROTEIN
Clinically proven effective skin-whitening agent in Japan with exemplary cell renewing and anti-aging properties.

BELLIS PERENNIS EXTRACT
Latest skin-whitening ingredient in Japan that actively influences all stages of melanin production to provide long-lasting whitening effect on skin.

ALPHA-ARBUTIN
Recognized skin-whitening agent in Asia that naturally and visibly whitens skin.

FULVIC ACID
Is the finest electrolyte known to man. Its electrolytes are able to restore vitality and have superior anti-aging components.

ARTEMIA EXTRACT
Protects the skin from UV damage.

DIRECTIONS:
Get an ample amount of cream and apply on desired area. Do not apply on broken and irritated skin. For underarm use, refrain from applying the cream together with a deodorant.

name: PLACENTA WHITE ALL-IN-ONE BODY SOAP
description:
Radiantly, stunning body. Don’t get left behind get all the beauty benefits that your body needs through whitening, anti-Aging, moisturizing, anti-Cellulite, uv protection and peeling. Flaunt that fairer body envied by many. 

Content: 120 g 

BENEFITS:
Exfoliate and look fresh with Lactic, Malic and Citric Acid that is good for peeling.
Protect your skin from harmful UV rays with Sericin, a potent UV Protection ingredient a multi-layer of sun shield.
Improve your skin’s smoothness and softness with moisture-rich ingredients like Glucose and Squalane.
All you need is All-in-One Body Soap to improve skin conditions like spots, freckles and wrinkles. Enhance skin elasticity for fairer, younger looking body.

INGREDIENTS:
PLACENTAL PROTEIN
It is clinically proven more effective skin-whitening and skin-nourishing ingredient with exemplary cell renewing and anti-aging properties than Pig Placenta Protein.

ALGAE EXTRACT
Normalizes the skin’s moisture content and provides suppleness to the epidermis.

SERICIN
Creates a protective film on the skin to block pollution and harmful UV rays.

CITRIC ACID
Good for mild peeling to treat such skin conditions like fine lines and wrinkles, hyper- and depigmentation, spots and excessively dry skin.

SQUALANE
An effective moisturizer that will make your skin feel supple, look plumper and wrinkles will be less apparent.

HYDROLYZED COLLAGEN
It forms a film on the surface of the skin making it smoother and softer.

DIPOTASSIUM GLYCYRRHIZATE
Is an anti-irritant and anti-inflammatory component with skin-soothing properties. Clinical tests point to this ingredient as an effective treatment for atopic dermatitis because of its ability to reduce redness and irritation.

DIRECTIONS:
Work into rich lather and massage lightly on skin to remove deep-seated dirt from your pores. Use as a regular body soap. For best results, use daily.
